title: Cafe Campestre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, International, Organic, Thai, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers locally sourced and mostly organic food. Has a comprehensive vegetarian menu with many vegan and gluten free clearly marked choices. Will custom create a dish for you. Also offers tours and has self contained accommodations.
streetAddress: Balgue, Isla de Ometepe, Altagracia, Rivas
